name: X-treme Express
synopsis: For the first time ever you have the chance to drive a train on the Playstation 2. You can compete in train races, pull some stock around, ram other trains of the track or just go for a spin through the countryside. You have 4 game modes to choose from: ''Grand Prix'': the main mode where you'll race on all the tracks avaible for the game, ''Tour'': in this mode you'll have to complete some special challegnes to unlock more trains, ''Free'': choose your favourite settings and start a race and ''Versus'': to compete with another player.
